languages.text: Немезит планирует нанести удар во время торжественной церемонии принятия у офицеров клятвы-присяги новым корабельным исповедником. Вместо высоких гостей и их семей Мастер дисциплины отправит на церемонию переодетых блюстителей. Как только Немезит решит напасть на "беспомощных гостей" — капкан захлопнется.

Nemesite is planning to strike during the formal ceremony of the swearing-in of the officers that is to be performed by the new ship's confessor. In place of the usual distinguished guests, the Master-at-Arms will instead fill the chapel with disguised enforcers. The moment Nemesite decides to attack the not-so-helpless guests, the trap will be sprung.
languages.original_text: Немезит планирует нанести удар во время торжественной церемонии принятия у офицеров клятвы-присяги новым корабельным исповедником. Вместо высоких гостей и их семей Мастер дисциплины отправит на церемонию переодетых блюстителей. Как только Немезит решит напасть на "беспомощных гостей" — капкан захлопнется.

traits.locale_text: Nemesite is planning to strike during the formal ceremony of swearing in the officers performed by the new ship's confessor. Instead of distinguished guests, Jocasta will send fill the chapel with her enforcers in disguise. The moment Nemesite decides to attack the "helpless guests", the trap will be sprung.

languages.text: Nemesit plant einen Angriff bei der formellen Vereidigungszeremonie der Offiziere, die vom neuen Konfessor des Schiffs durchgeführt werden soll. Statt der üblichen distinguierten Gäste wird der Waffenmeister die Kapelle mit verkleideten Enforcern füllen. Sobald Nemesit auf die nicht ganz so hilflosen Gäste losgeht, schnappt die Falle zu.
languages.original_text: Nemesite is planning to strike during the formal ceremony of the swearing-in of the officers that is to be performed by the new ship's confessor. In place of the usual distinguished guests, the Master-at-Arms will instead fill the chapel with disguised enforcers. The moment Nemesite decides to attack the not-so-helpless guests, the trap will be sprung.

traits.locale_text: Nemesit plant einen Angriff bei der formellen Vereidigungszeremonie der Offiziere, die vom neuen Konfessor des Schiffs durchgeführt werden soll. Statt der üblichen distinguierten Gäste wird der Waffenmeister die Kapelle mit verkleideten Enforcern füllen. Sobald Nemesit auf die nicht ganz so hilflosen Gäste losgeht, schnappt die Falle zu.

languages.text: Nemesitio planea atentar durante la ceremonia formal de investidura de los oficiales que ha de celebrar el nuevo confesor de la nave. En lugar de los distinguidos invitados habituales, la maestra de armas va a llenar la capilla de guardias disfrazados. Cuando Nemesitio ataque a los no tan indefensos asistentes, caerá de lleno en la trampa.
languages.original_text: Nemesite is planning to strike during the formal ceremony of the swearing-in of the officers that is to be performed by the new ship's confessor. In place of the usual distinguished guests, the Master-at-Arms will instead fill the chapel with disguised enforcers. The moment Nemesite decides to attack the not-so-helpless guests, the trap will be sprung.

traits.locale_text: Nemesitio planea atentar durante la ceremonia formal de investidura de los oficiales que ha de celebrar el nuevo confesor de la nave. En lugar de los distinguidos invitados habituales, la maestra de armas va a llenar la capilla de guardias disfrazados. Cuando Nemesitio ataque a los no tan indefensos asistentes, caerá de lleno en la trampa.

languages.text: ネメサイトは、新しい船の聴罪師が執り行う公式な士官宣誓式の最中に攻撃を仕掛けるつもりだ。通常の賓客の代わりに、マスター・アット・アームは変装したエンフォーサーで礼拝堂を埋め尽くそうと考える。ネメサイトがタダでは倒されない招待客を襲うと決めた瞬間、罠は発動する。
languages.original_text: Nemesite is planning to strike during the formal ceremony of the swearing-in of the officers that is to be performed by the new ship's confessor. In place of the usual distinguished guests, the Master-at-Arms will instead fill the chapel with disguised enforcers. The moment Nemesite decides to attack the not-so-helpless guests, the trap will be sprung.

traits.locale_text: ネメサイトは、新しい船の聴罪師が執り行う公式な士官宣誓式の最中に攻撃を仕掛けるつもりだ。通常の賓客の代わりに、マスター・アット・アームは変装したエンフォーサーで礼拝堂を埋め尽くそうと考える。ネメサイトがタダでは倒されない招待客を襲うと決めた瞬間、罠は発動する。

languages.text: 船上的新任告解神父准备举行军官宣誓仪式，而涅墨斯特打算借着这个机会发动袭击。戒律大师安排了许多乔装打扮的执法者扮演参加仪式的贵宾。当涅墨斯特打算袭击那些完全算不上手无寸铁的宾客时，他就会落入陷阱之中。
languages.original_text: Nemesite is planning to strike during the formal ceremony of the swearing-in of the officers that is to be performed by the new ship's confessor. In place of the usual distinguished guests, the Master-at-Arms will instead fill the chapel with disguised enforcers. The moment Nemesite decides to attack the not-so-helpless guests, the trap will be sprung.

traits.locale_text: 船上的新任告解神父准备举行军官宣誓仪式，而涅墨斯特打算借着这个机会发动袭击。戒律大师安排了许多乔装打扮的执法者扮演参加仪式的贵宾。当涅墨斯特打算袭击那些完全算不上手无寸铁的宾客时，他就会落入陷阱之中。

languages.text: Némésite compte frapper au cours de la cérémonie de prestation de serment des officiers présidée par le nouveau confesseur du vaisseau. Au lieu des invités habituels, la capitaine d'armes va remplir la chapelle de prévôts déguisés en civils. À l'instant précis où le rebelle passera à l'attaque, le piège se refermera sur lui.
languages.original_text: Nemesite is planning to strike during the formal ceremony of the swearing-in of the officers that is to be performed by the new ship's confessor. In place of the usual distinguished guests, the Master-at-Arms will instead fill the chapel with disguised enforcers. The moment Nemesite decides to attack the not-so-helpless guests, the trap will be sprung.

traits.locale_text: Némésite compte frapper au cours de la cérémonie de prestation de serment des officiers présidée par le nouveau confesseur du vaisseau. Au lieu des invités habituels, la capitaine d'armes va remplir la chapelle de prévôts déguisés en civils. À l'instant précis où le rebelle passera à l'attaque, le piège se refermera sur lui.

languages.text: Nemezit, geminin yeni günah çıkarıcısı tarafından gerçekleştirilecek resmî subay yemin töreninde saldırıya geçmeyi planlıyor. Silahtar, şapeli her zamanki seçkin konuklar yerine kılık değiştirmiş infazcılarla dolduracak. Nemezit'in çok da biçare olmayan konuklara saldırıya geçme kararı vermesiyle birlikte tuzak devreye girecek.
languages.original_text: Nemesite is planning to strike during the formal ceremony of the swearing-in of the officers that is to be performed by the new ship's confessor. In place of the usual distinguished guests, the Master-at-Arms will instead fill the chapel with disguised enforcers. The moment Nemesite decides to attack the not-so-helpless guests, the trap will be sprung.
